thread.section_title: 123RF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 123RF | www.123rf.com
thread.title: Neal Taylor

author: Neal Taylor
title: Neal Taylor
text:
We are a very small charity in Lilydale, Victoria, Australia and utilise 123RF for all of our graphics and commercial images for much of our promotional work. While they may not always have new material for some searches, the amount of new material keeps most of yours searches fresh.
Our only criticism would be that they don't offer charities and non-profits a discount! But despite that, we love the pricing for our minimal usage of the site, and feel that it is quite fair for use.
So, thank you to all the photographers, designers, artists, models and people that make 123RF possible! You are a Godsend!
